class pyefun.commonlyUtil.临时目录[源代码]¶

基类：ubelt.util_path.TempDir

用于创建和清理临时目录的上下文。

示例

with 临时目录() as self:

dpath = self.dpath print(dpath) assert 文件是否存在(dpath)

assert not 文件是否存在(dpath)

示例

self = 临时目录() dpath = self.ensure() assert exists(dpath) self.cleanup() assert not exists(dpath)
